question: You recently stayed at your friend’s place, to look after the house while he/she is away. You accidentally damaged something in his/her house. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter, you should:describe what the accident wasexplain when it happenedsuggest how the damage can be fixed.
text: I am glad to hear that you had a great vacation. During your trip, it was my pleasure to look after your residence. However, I would like to convey my apologise for breaking your keyboard, that situation was out of my control.

The last Monday, While I was working on your desktop all of a sudden your cat jumped on my hand from nowhere due to which I dropped the keyboard to the floor. As a result, some keys are seperated from the mainboard and a few keys are totally smashed.

Nevertheless, To compensate, I have placed an online order for a new wireless keyboard and a mouse which will be delivered to your address by end of the day tomorrow. Please be available at your nest to collect a courier or keep me posted if you are away so that I could change the delivery date.
Hopefully, you like a new product!. See you soon!.

error_list.error_des: The word apologise doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
If you do not want seperated to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
